meta_title: EzStays Case Study | Scalable Operating System for Student Housing | General Tech Works
meta_description: Discover how General Tech Works built EzStays - a high-performing operating system for student housing with intuitive UX, real-time availability, and seamless integrations.
title: EzStays – Operating System for Student Housing

sections.head: Overview
sections.content: EzStays is a next-generation student hostel chain aiming to modernize the way residential campuses are run across India. They operate multiple properties near university hubs and needed a central platform to digitize their end-to-end hostel operations.
With an ambitious goal to scale efficiently while maintaining high service quality, EzStays partnered with us to build a custom SaaS platform tailored to the student living ecosystem.

content.sub-listing: Enquiry-to-onboarding was inconsistent, with no centralized tracking or automation, leading to missed leads and double bookings.
Mess, transport, room allocation, and refund workflows were handled manually by different teams,causing delays, errors, and student dissatisfaction.
Management lacked visibility into live occupancy, payment statuses, maintenance requests, or staff performance.
Without a systemized backend, expansion to new cities posed a massive operational and reputational risk.

sections.head: Our Solution
sections.content: We built EzStaysOS, a full-stack hostel management platform designed to digitize every workflow, from sales to services, from wardens to top management.

content.sub-listing: Centralized lead capture, automated follow-ups, source performance tracking, and one-click admissions.
Students can apply, pay, track mess menus, log complaints, and renew stay, all from a mobile-first interface.
Room allocations, student check-ins, incident logs, and violation tracking, simplified in a secure portal.
Live room-wise tracking of bed availability, gender/capacity rules, and auto-blocking logic.
Menu planning, student feedback, kitchen procurement, and inventory tracking integrated seamlessly.
Daily pickup-drop scheduling, QR-based student boarding, vehicle assignment, and route logs.
Rent invoicing, partial payments, late fee logic, and instant refund workflows with approvals.
Biometric staff attendance, payroll generation, and event/staff duty scheduling.
Real-time insights into revenue, expenses, occupancy, dues, and center-wise profitability.

content.listing: Over 75% reduction in daily manual tasks for wardens and operations
Live control over all branches from a central MIS dashboard
Increased student satisfaction & retention due to transparency and ease of use
Enabled scalable expansion into new cities with replicable systems

sections.quote: EzStays wouldn't be where it is today without this system. We went from being operationally overwhelmed to completely in control. Every stakeholder, student, parent, warden, kitchen team, finance, now works in sync. The Flyde team didn’t just build a product, they built a foundation for our scale.
sections.author: Rishabh A.

meta_title: TransExpert Case Study | Logistics Software Solution | General Tech Works
meta_description: See how General Tech Works helped TransExpert digitize logistics operations with a robust software solution - improving efficiency, tracking, and scalability.
title: TransExpert – A Complete Corporate Rebuild for a Logistics Powerhouse

sections.head: Overview
sections.content: TransExpert is a multi-brand freight forwarding and customs clearance company with operations spanning India, Canada, and UAE. Over the years, the group had grown rapidly through vertical expansion, yet its digital presence, internal brand alignment, and operational platforms remained fragmented. We partnered with TransExpert to lead an enterprise-wide transformation , rethinking their brand identity, redesigning their communication materials, and rebuilding their digital experience from the ground up.We partnered with TransExpert to lead an enterprise-wide transformation, rethinking their brand identity, redesigning their communication materials, and rebuilding their digital experience from the ground up.

We partnered with TransExpert to lead an enterprise-wide transformation, rethinking their brand identity, redesigning their communication materials, and rebuilding their digital experience from the ground up.

sections.head: The Challenge
sections.content: With three sub-brands operating under one group, TransExpert faced major strategic and operational roadblocks:

content.sub-listing: Each vertical had its own ad-hoc branding, leading to confusion among customers, partners, and even internal teams.
Investor decks, letterheads, and sales brochures lacked consistency, polish, and alignment with the company’s scale and credibility.
The group lacked a clear web presence. There were no individual websites or portals to explain service offerings or attract enterprise leads.

content.listing: No Internal CMS or Process Automation
content.sub-listing: All inquiries, shipment tracking, and lead capture processes were manual and varied across branches.

sections.head: Our Solution
sections.content: We took on a 360° digital and brand transformation mandate, merging strategy, design, and development into a tightly coordinated execution plan.

content.sub-listing: Defined a clear brand hierarchy for the three verticals
Designed distinctive but related logos for each brand
Rebuilt all external-facing documents
Created three lightweight, high-speed, SEO-optimized websites
listing1: Lead capture forms with analytics integration

content.sub-listing: Designed backend wireframes

content.listing: 100% Brand Alignment across 3 countries and 3 business verticals
Enterprise-grade Web Presence launched within 6 weeks
Improved Sales Collateral resulted in better conversion rates in B2B presentations
Established Foundation for future operational digitization and client portal rollout

sections.quote: We always knew our operations were strong, but Flyde helped us look the part. They didn’t just design logos and websites, they gave our group a global face and a scalable foundation. We’ve never been prouder to present ourselves to clients.
sections.author: Amit T.,

meta_title: NumYum Case Study | Food Delivery App Success | General Tech Works
meta_description: See how General Tech Works helped NumYum launch a scalable food delivery app with seamless UX, fast performance, and rapid market adoption.
title: Numyum – Reinventing the Cloud Kitchen Ordering Experience

sections.head: Overview
sections.content: Numyum is a rapidly growing cloud kitchen and catering brand specializing in party platters, with operations spanning multiple franchise kitchens. The company approached us with the goal of streamlining their direct ordering channel while maintaining brand control and operational scalability.

sections.head: The Challenge
sections.content: Despite having a loyal customer base, Numyum faced several business hurdles that hindered growth:

content.sub-listing: Relying on food delivery aggregators meant high commissions, inconsistent brand experience, and limited visibility into customer data.
Party platters required customers to make multiple selections with variants, notes, and preferences,something that typical e-commerce or food ordering systems could not handle natively.
With multiple kitchens operating in different zones, ensuring accurate routing, approvals, and branch-level pricing was a major bottleneck.
Numyum needed a way to approve high-value or custom orders manually while maintaining a frictionless experience for regular orders.

sections.head: Our  Solution
sections.content: We built a robust, fully custom ordering system tailored specifically to Numyum’s business model. The solution was designed to grow with them, not just for now, but for the next 10x of scale.

content.sub-listing: Frictionless, secure customer onboarding using phone numbers, no passwords, no app installs.
A highly visual menu experience that lets customers customize every item, from base selection to sides, add-ons, notes, and quantity, all validated in real-time.
Orders are automatically routed to the nearest franchise kitchen based on pin code, with fallback logic for unavailable zones.
Each kitchen can configure its own pricing, available products, and delivery zones, all controlled via an internal admin panel.
Orders above a certain value or with extensive customization trigger an internal approval system for operational confirmation.
Customers get live updates for order received, preparation, and dispatch,  synced directly from the kitchen dashboard.

content.listing: Increased Direct Orders by 4x within the first quarter post-launch
Reduced dependency on food aggregators, saving over 22% in commission costs
Improved kitchen efficiency with clear routing and inventory control
Higher customer satisfaction due to seamless ordering and customization flexibility

sections.quote: Working with the Flyde team has completely changed how we operate. Their deep understanding of our challenges and their ability to build a system, not just a website, was a game-changer. Our customers love the new experience, and our operation
sections.author: Siddharth K.,

meta_title: Itel Case Study | Scalable eCommerce Success | General Tech Works
meta_description: Learn how General Tech Works scaled Itel’s eCommerce platform with optimized UX, advanced backend integration, and improved performance across devices.
title: Itel – A Custom-Built E-commerce Platform for a D2C Electronics Brand

sections.head: Overview
sections.content: Itel, a consumer electronics brand with a strong offline retail presence, wanted to aggressively expand into the D2C (Direct-to-Consumer) space. Their goal was to move beyond templated platforms and build a fully owned digital storefront, fast, flexible, and optimized for conversion.
They partnered with us to develop a bespoke e-commerce solution that would scale with their growing portfolio and deliver a seamless experience across India.

sections.head: The Challenge
sections.subheading: Itel needed more than just a basic e-commerce website. Key challenges included:

content.sub-listing: Shopify and WooCommerce couldn’t accommodate their dynamic pricing logic, performance expectations, and region-specific requirements.
Electronics products had multiple variants, warranty conditions, accessories, and bundles,all needing to be managed flexibly.
The site needed to bridge the gap between online orders and fulfillment from local inventory or stores, with location-aware logic.
The e-commerce backend had to sync with Unicommerce (their inventory and fulfillment partner) and future-proof for CRM, SMS, and marketing workflows.

sections.head: Our  Solution
sections.content: We designed and developed a high-performance, full-stack e-commerce platform using the MERN stack, tailored to Itel’s present needs and future ambitions.

content.sub-listing: A lightning-fast storefront with smart filtering, instant page transitions, and performance tuning for mobile-heavy traffic.
Built a fuzzy logic–based search experience with real-time suggestions, trending queries, and product preview on hover.
Location-based discovery of authorized Itel stores near the customer,integrated with Google Maps API and pincode logic.
Modular architecture supporting bundles, color variants, EMI eligibility, and promo codes , all configurable via admin panel.
Seamless order flow, inventory sync, and dispatch tracking via Unicommerce APIs,enabling real-time coordination with warehouses and partners.
Role-based access for operations, marketing, and support teams, including product uploads, banners, pricing overrides, and flash deals.

content.listing: Custom Platform Ownership with zero SaaS dependency
3x Faster Page Loads vs. templated platforms
Better Conversions via live search and optimized checkout
Scalable Infrastructure with complete roadmap control
Ready for Omni-Channel retail sync in the future

sections.quote: This wasn’t just a website, it was our digital foundation. The Flyde team delivered a fast, beautiful, and powerful system that mirrors our brand. Their approach was strategic, execution-focused, and completely aligned with our goals
sections.author: Arjun M.,
